name: UltimateSportsTrivia
0:
”Alexa, open Ultimate Sports Trivia”
”Alexa, start Ultimate Sports Trivia”
”Alexa, launch Ultimate Sports Trivia”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: ultimate sports trivia
des:
I am Sohom Bose, a high school student and the developer of this Alexa Skill.
Ultimate Sports Trivia is a skill which asks various questions regarding sports facts, stats, historical records, current athlete information, and more. The skill will be periodically updated with more comprehensive questions, and will also include more sports categories. Right now, the major American and international sports, such as soccer, basketball, and tennis, have the majority of questions, but smaller sports will be added soon.

To start the Ultimate Sports Trivia, you can say:

"Alexa, open Ultimate Sports Trivia"
"Alexa, start Ultimate Sports Trivia"
"Alexa, launch Ultimate Sports Trivia"
 
Please direct suggestions and feedback to sohombose7@gmail.com
